alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 8:02PM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 14.7 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 9.5 Wed 7 pm CST 12.8 14.3 14.7 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
